summary: Just the preset that is my current characte, sorry for the low texture images.
descriptionHtml:
So after years of playing Skyrim and modding, characters and completed games I've decided that it's time to do my little contribution to the Nexus.
Therefore this is my first file uploaded, or mod.

This is the preset of my current character, which is the one I'm using for my new play through with Requiem.
It may not be the best preset but it's the preset that I made that was good looking enough to share, maybe some other time in the future I'll upload my first character (in case that this preset is liked at least lol)

[size=4][u][b]Since this is a RaceMenu Preset it's notorious that you will need RaceMenu to be able to use this.[/b][/u][/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]You can get RaceMenu [/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]here[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]
[/url][/size][/list][color=#0000ff][size=5][color=#3c78d8]Requirements[/color]
[/size][/color][list=1]
[*][size=2]The Witcher 3 Eyes by Oaristys get it from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]here[/url][/size]

[*][size=2]KS Hairdos Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky get it from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]here[/url][/size]

[*][size=2]Brows by Hvergelmir get it from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]here[/url][/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?][/url][/size]
[*][size=2]SKSE which you can get from [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]here[/url][/size]


[/list][size=2] And of course Skyrim.

[size=3]To look like the images:[/size] (depending on your graphics quality of course)
[color=#3c78d8]Body[/color]: Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Ediion by Caliente, get it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]here[/url]
[color=#3c78d8]Body texture[/color]: Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy, get it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]here[/url]
[/size]
[color=#3d85c6][size=4]How to install:[/size][/color]
Using a mod manager is always recommended
The manual installation is just to drop the SKSE folder inside the .rar file to the Data directory of Skyrim which by default on steam is on C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[u]
[size=3]
[/size][/u][i][size=5]As a matter of fact images would be very much appreciated since mine are a bit low res or graphically weaker.[/size][u]

[/u][color=#3d85c6][size=3][b]Some permissions[/b][/size][/color][/i]
You can use my preset in case you want models for your mod just [size=2]say that the preset is mine.
[/size]
[u][size=3]If by any reason I made a mistake on the credits section or if I didn't credit someone correctly PLEASE let me know.[/size][/u]
[color=#3d85c6][size=4][i][b]Credits[/b][/i][/size][/color]
Oaristys for the awesome eye textures from The Witcher 3 in The Witcher 3 Eyes mod
Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky for the hairstyles  and the general KS Hairdos Renewal mod
Hvergelmir for the good looking Brows mod
Bethesda for creating Skyrim
And YOU for viewing/downloading this preset
author: PacoMax1
